name: Burstin' Ballparks
description:
By Julissa L. and Matt P.

In the year 1993, you and your friends head to a mysterious roadside carnival in Loda, Illinois. When you arrive, your friends vanish behind you, and you are confronted by a mysterious cloaked figure. “You should not have come here mortal, for this is the land of Bratwurstia. This place holds nothing but hotdogs and death,” he says. “I challenge you to a game of Bursting Ballparks. If you manage to burst one thousand of my hotdog minions, you and your friends will be free to leave, but should you fail, your souls will be mine…”

The controls are just clicking to burst hotdogs. The player must burst as many hotdogs as possible before the time runs out.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
